mapper.delete: delete from TbTokenInfo where token in ( select token from TbToken where timestampdiff(minute,lastupdate,now()) > (select configValue from TbConfig where configKey='token.timeout' ) )
mapper.select: select token,info,lastupdate from TbTokenInfo where token=#{token} and infoKey='imagecode'
mapper.update: update TbTokenInfo set info=#{info},lastupdate=now() where token=#{token} and infoKey='imagecode'
mapper.delete: delete from TbTokenInfo where token=#{token} and infoKey='imagecode'
mapper.select: select token,info,lastupdate from TbTokenInfo where token=#{token} and infoKey='user'
mapper.update: update TbTokenInfo set info=#{info},lastupdate=now() where token=#{token} and infoKey='user'
mapper.delete: delete from TbTokenInfo where token=#{token} and infoKey='user'
